text: @UWF_Faculty🎉Congrats to our interdisciplinary team of faculty on their successful work in cancer prevention in Florida! 🎉As a passionate liberal, I am thrilled to see the impact of their dedication to public health and cancer prevention. The team's program evaluation skills have grown tremendously since 2018, and it's exciting to see the contract renewed for four more years! 💪Their work developing evaluation plans, designing data collection methods, analyzing data, establishing performance indicators, and preparing comprehensive reports is essential for program enhancement. It's a testament to their commitment to making a difference in people's lives. 🌟Keep up the fantastic work, Dr. Strahan, Dr. Hahn, and team! 👏 Can't wait to see what the future holds for your important research! 🔍
